testCase.name: CadastrarRotina Component registers a routine if all values are valid
CadastrarRotina Component should show error if title is empty
CadastrarRotina Component should show error if title is too long
CadastrarRotina Component should render input fields and save button
CadastrarRotina Component should hide error message when input is corrected
CadastrarRotina Component should show error if date has the wrong format
CadastrarRotina Component should show error if date is empty
CadastrarRotina Component should show error if time has the wrong format
CadastrarRotina Component should show error if time is empty
CadastrarRotina Component should show error if description is too long
CadastrarRotina Component should show error if a category is not selected
